text: Nachtbringer is the third EP from German futurepop band Blutengel. It was released as a single CD, and limited edition CD/DVD. The DVD is a live performance from the Tränenherz Tour 2011. To promote the EP, a music video for Nachtbringer was made. ==Track listing== ==References== * ==External links== * Category:2011 EPs Category:Blutengel albums
title: Nachtbringer
